meanings.definition: A long upholstered seat for more than one person, typically with a back and arms.
meanings.sent1: The cozy settees in the living room are perfect for relaxing with friends.
meanings.sent2: We bought a new settee for our family room to accommodate more guests.
meanings.sent3: The settees at the furniture store looked like fluffy clouds waiting to be sat on.
meanings.sent4: Her living room settees were like welcoming hugs after a long day at work.
meanings.sent5: The settees in the cafe beckoned customers to sit and enjoy a cup of coffee.

meanings.definition: To put in a particular position or state.
meanings.sent1: Please settee the vase on the table carefully to avoid any breakage.
meanings.sent2: He settees the books neatly on the shelf to keep them organized.
meanings.sent3: The magician settees the rabbit in the hat, ready for the grand reveal.
meanings.sent4: She settees her goals high and works hard to achieve them.
meanings.sent5: The chef settees the ingredients in a row before starting to cook the meal.

meanings.definition: To adjust or arrange in a particular way.
meanings.sent1: She settees the pillows on the couch to make it look more inviting.
meanings.sent2: The interior designer settees the furniture to create a cozy atmosphere.
meanings.sent3: The kids settees their toys in a line, pretending it was a train.
meanings.sent4: He settees his schedule meticulously to make sure he doesn't miss any appointments.
meanings.sent5: The florist settees the flowers in a beautiful bouquet for the wedding.
